attributes.action: only respond to petitions with less than 2 signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that an assumption is being made by many that an idea that has the support of millions is better than an idea only supported by one person. History shows us that one persons idea (gravity, natural selection, the espresso machine) are always superior to those held by millions (fascism, Marxism, Islam and supporting Manchester United). The Prime Minister should ignore all ideas held by more than 1 person and only respond to original suggestions from individuals. Please do not sign my petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
